mainBanner.bienvenida: Welcome to the Chamber of Industries and Production of Santo Domingo

quienesSomos.historia: The Chamber of Industries and Production of Santo Domingo was founded to organize the different production entities in the region. Since its inception, it has promoted the unity of its members and actively represented their interests, fostering industrial development and progress.
quienesSomos.mision: To promote productivity and regional development of the Chamber of Industries as an institution that leads the industrial and production sectors, with proactive representation before the state through strengthening research, entrepreneurship, development, formalization, competitiveness, and business innovation, always aiming for job creation and social welfare.
quienesSomos.vision: To position our institution as an influential, efficient, and well-organized entity regionally, becoming a benchmark in national development in the medium term and promoting the competitiveness of entrepreneurs, sectors, and the state.
quienesSomos.conoceEquipo: Meet Our President, Vice President and Directory
quienesSomos.descripcionEquipo: In this section, we introduce our president and vice president along with the management team that supports them in achieving our organizational goals.
quienesSomos.descripcionEquipo2: The success of our organization depends not only on the vision of our president, but also on the work of a committed and highly trained team. Below, we introduce you to the members of the management team who, together with the president, make the development and growth of the Santo Domingo Chamber of Industries possible.

presidenta.cita: ''All the people I know are superior to me in some way, and in that sense, I learn from them. I do not stay long in a place where I don't learn or grow a little more than the day before.''
presidenta.detalle1: President of the Chamber of Industries of Santo Domingo

fundador.cita: ''Being grateful honors you. It is important to give back to society a part of all that we have received from it. Gratitude is about knowing and demonstrating it.''
fundador.detalle2: Vice President of the Chamber of Industries of Santo Domingo

servicios.seccionTitulo: Services of the Chamber of Industries
servicios.seccionDescripcion: We offer a comprehensive portfolio of services to strengthen the industry, facilitating strategic connections, specialized training, and guild representation.
servicios.conexionesDescripcion: We facilitate networking between companies and industries, generating business opportunities in both B2B and B2B2C environments.
servicios.marketingDescripcion: We support companies in increasing the visibility of their products and services through marketing strategies and promotional events.
servicios.seminariosDescripcion: We organize specialized courses and workshops to strengthen business competencies and improve productivity.
servicios.asesoriaDescripcion: We provide guidance on regulations, financing, and growth strategies to promote business development.
servicios.innovacionDescripcion: We support the adoption of new technologies and process digitalization to improve competitiveness.
servicios.representacionDescripcion: We defend the interests of the industrial sector before government entities and regulatory organizations.
servicios.comercioDescripcion: We facilitate exports and imports, providing advice on trade agreements and international opportunities.
servicios.certificadoDescripcion: We manage the certification of the origin of products to facilitate international trade.

servicios.descripcion: Explore our solutions designed to strengthen your business. From specialized advice to digital transformation, we accompany you every step of the way to success. üöÄ

networking.descripcion: In a constantly evolving business world, strategic connections are key to growth and innovation. Our networking spaces and events are designed to foster collaboration among entrepreneurs, business owners, and professionals from various industries.
networking.exitoEnNegocios: Success in business is based on the relationships you build.
networking.Slogan: Join our community and expand your network at exclusive events.
networking.descripcionSeminarios: üéØ Boost your knowledge and skills. Participate in training sessions led by experts in various business areas. Improve your business management, acquire new market strategies, and prepare for the challenges of the industrial sector.
networking.descripcionEventosCooperativos: üåç Collaboration for business growth. These meetings are designed to strengthen cooperation between companies, promoting strategic alliances and joint projects that drive competitiveness in the region.
networking.descripcionNetworking: üíº Connect with industry leaders. Take advantage of these events to expand your network, meet suppliers and potential business partners, and discover new business opportunities in a dynamic and professional environment.
networking.descripcionBlog: Networking is a powerful tool for business growth. Discover the most important events in the industry.

tbc.descripcion: Promoting business connections and business opportunities.
tbc.descripcionTbc: The Ts√°chila Business Convention is an annual event organized by the Chamber of Industries and Production of Santo Domingo, in collaboration with the Provincial Government of Santo Domingo de los Ts√°chilas. It is designed to offer learning, networking, and business opportunities in a dynamic and strategic space. Entrepreneurs, national and international buyers, and exporters have the opportunity to close deals, expand markets, and strengthen their business networks, promoting the growth of the industrial and agri-commercial sector.
tbc.macrorruedaDescripcion: An exclusive space where entrepreneurs, national and international buyers, and exporters can strategically connect with new business partners.
tbc.formacionDescripcion: Talks, conferences, and panels with experts in foreign trade, business innovation, and industrial growth.
tbc.networkingDescripcion: A unique opportunity to generate valuable connections with entrepreneurs, suppliers, and buyers from the region and the country.

tef.descripcion: Driving business competitiveness, efficiency, and responsibility.
tef.descripcionTef: The Ts√°chila Economic Forum IV Edition is a high-level economic event inspired by the Davos Forum. Its main objective is to strengthen the local productive sector, promoting competitiveness, efficiency, and corporate responsibility. This forum attracts entrepreneurs and businesspeople from across the country, fostering collaboration and networking. The event will be broadcast live through digital channels and national media, with a projected audience of more than 20,000 views and 1,200 attendees, including 600 entrepreneurs, producers, and agricultural exporters.
tef.foroEcon√≥micoDescripcion: Analysis of key topics such as the impact of the Chancay Port in Peru, the political and commercial context of the new U.S. government, and emerging economies.
tef.casosDeExitoDescripcion: Presentation of two national success stories and a third case on non-traditional export products grown in Ts√°chila lands.
tef.networkingDescripcion: B2B space for strategic connections, accompanied by a business fair, open barbecue, and live music.
tef.info: Discover unique opportunities for business growth and connect with industry leaders! Don't miss the key information about the event.
